title: Welp, it's locking up again...
body:
Awhile back I was having problems with league completely locking up my PC, I did every thing the support people told me to do and the problem went away for about a month and now they're back, league is locking up my PC again.

If any support people see this, please tell me there is an actual fix for this, I really don't want to be banned for something like this. I've done EVERYTHING that was asked and havnt changed anything. I'm at my wit's end I just don't know what to do. Before anyone says anything about my vid card going bad or temps are to hot or I'm getting corrupt files, I can tell you none of these are the problems this whole system is bearally a year old and I only play 3 days a week the rest of the time my PC is off. So it doesn't get a butt load of usage time.

Someone after a game told me Riot had a write up on Reddit about it and after roughly 2 hours of looking I couldn't find it. So if anyone has a link to this write up please link it cause I just can't find it.

Thanks, Ozag.

replies.body: How do I find that windows update ( not tech savvy I just play games) and I'm not using win 8 I'm using 7 ultimate.

As *Oloferno* mentioned, rolling back recent windows updates may be a good place to start. You can find a guide on how to do this [here.](http://www.howtogeek.com/206271/how-to-roll-back-or-uninstall-a-problematic-windows-update/)

Let me know if this helped.

http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en/4qYFpisg-pc-freezes-after-login
Uninstall windows update KB2976978 do a reboot and check if it happens again.
